rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, put a blaze counter on Gruul War Trance if you’re in a trance. Then, Gruul War Trance deals damage to each opponent and each planeswalker you don’t control equal to the number of blaze counters on Gruul War Trance. [i](You’re in a trance if you’ve cast a noncreature spell or created a token this turn.)[/i]
